about: As someone who enjoys bringing characters to life through cosplaying, I have developed a strong attention to detail. This attention to detail carries over into my coding practices, where I meticulously optimize and refine every line of code. Just as cosplaying allows me to immerse myself in my favorite characters' worlds, coding allows me to create immersive digital experiences that leave a lasting impact.

projects.title: Enter Zabali
projects.description: Rogue-like action role-playing game made using the Godot game engine. Enter Zabali is a game where you can control 1 of the 4 playable characters; A knight, thief, mage or a civilian. Your goal is to defeat the final boss found within the deepest floor in the Zabali dungeon.

projects.title: Ideanaleh
projects.description: A php web application with the laravel framework. Ideanaleh is a reward-based crowdfunding based for the Philippine market. Users can post their projects and receive funding from backers. This was our red-lit thesis project due to its monetary components.

projects.title: Tarheta
projects.description: Tarheta is a powerful web application designed for both students and teachers to make learning more engaging and efficient. With Tarheta, users can create flashcards for quizzes, exams, and reviewers, allowing them to review and reinforce key concepts in an interactive and enjoyable way. For teachers, Tarheta also provides the option to create classes, enabling them to organize simultaneous tests and quiz-taking for their students.

projects.title: Axie Calculator App
projects.description: A simple python tkinter application with axie stats API integration. Axie Calculator is an app to aid with tracking the enemy's energy. It includes features such as tracker for ranking, smooth-love-potion and winrate, persistent window and adjustable window opacity.

projects.title: Into the Battlefield
projects.description: Into the Battlefield is a 2D local area network multiplayer game compatible with Windows 10 laptops and Android 8.0 to 13 mobile devices. It is a thrilling game that challenges players to lead their pieces into battle and emerge victorious. The game is set in a war-torn landscape, with players taking on the role of commanders responsible for commanding their armies to victory. In this game, strategy is key, and players must make strategic decisions to outmaneuver their opponents and secure victory.
